original_text:
Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx
Vi ricordate l’esploratore Jungle Jim e le sue gesta nel leggendario luogo di El Dorado? Eccolo di nuovo sui rulli della Microgaming, pronto per una nuova avventura stavolta ambientata all’ombra delle Piramidi. Tre anni dopo l’uscita di Jungle Jim and El Dorado, la software house Microgaming ci propone un nuovo capitolo della saga, migliorato sia dal punto di vista della grafica sia per quanto riguarda il gameplay: si tratta infatti si una sorta di versione potenziata del gioco originale, con un potenziale di vincita più elevato e diverse funzionalità speciali in più.
Il gioco base è un classico con cinque rulli e 35 linee di pagamento, ma man mano che si fanno girare i rulli si sale di livello e a ognuno di questi corrisponde un moltiplicatore che parte da 2x per il primo livello per arrivare a 10x con il quinto (il doppio rispetto al moltiplicatore massimo di El Dorado).
La grafica è essenziale ma davvero ben curata e molto pulita: lo sfondo è un paesaggio desertico al calar della sera, su cui si staglia una sorta di tempio decorato con i geroglifici all’interno del quale troviamo la vera e propria schermata con i simboli.
Simboli, Wild e Scatter
La simbologia di Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx è ovviamente tematica, in riferimento all’antica cultura egizia: tra i rulli troviamo infatti il libro di Ra, un’anfora, una cassa intarsiata e una sorta di scudo.
Il simbolo Wild di questa slot machine è rappresentato dall’esploratore Jim in persona, che funge da Jolly e sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli, tranne lo Scatter, per determinare una combinazione vincente. Lo Scatter è invece il logo del gioco e permette di accedere alla funzione Bonus Free Spins.
In aggiunta a questi simboli tematici troviamo anche delle gemme di diversi colori: rosso, arancione, verde e blu; le pietre preziose sono presenti anche nel precedente capitolo della saga dell’esploratore Jim e rappresentano un punto di continuità tra i due giochi.
Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx: conclusioni
Questa nuovissima slot machine (uscita il 3 novembre ’19) della Microgaming nel complesso ha una modalità di gioco semplice e intuitiva, pur non essendo assolutamente banale: in virtù di ciò, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx è adatta a essere giocata sia da coloro che son nuovi nel mondo delle slot machine, sia dai giocatori un po’ più navigati che vogliono provare a vincere delle somme anche consistenti. La varianza di questa slot machine è infatti medio-alta: significa che le vincite, pur non essendo molto frequenti, possono raggiungere degli importi considerevoli e, infatti, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx offre una vincita massima di 6.250 volte la puntata durante i free spins, quasi il doppio rispetto a El Dorado che offriva invece 3.680x.
Nel complesso, in virtù del gameplay semplice ma ricco, della possibilità di vincite sostanziose e di una grafica e un tema molto coinvolgenti, ci sentiamo di consigliarvi questo gioco!
Non vi resta che fare le valigie e partire in compagnia dell’esploratore Jim!

raw_translation.response:
Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx

Do you remember the beloved explorer Jungle Jim and his adventures in the legendary El Dorado? Well, he's back on the reels of Microgaming, ready for a new adventure set in the shade of the Pyramids. Three years after the release of Jungle Jim and El Dorado, Microgaming software house offers us a new chapter in the saga, improved both in terms of graphics and gameplay: it is in fact a sort of enhanced version of the original game, with a higher potential for winnings and different special features.

The base game is a classic with five reels and 35 paylines, but as you spin the reels, you level up, and each level corresponds to a multiplier that starts at 2x for the first level and reaches 10x with the fifth (twice as much as the maximum multiplier of El Dorado).

The graphics are essential but really well-kept and very clean: the background is a desert landscape at sunset, on which a temple adorned with hieroglyphics stands out and inside which we find the real screen with symbols.

Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters

The symbolism of Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx is obviously thematic, referring to ancient Egyptian culture: among the reels, we find the Book of Ra, an amphora, an inlaid box, and a sort of shield.

The Wild symbol of this slot machine is represented by the explorer Jim himself, who acts as a Joker and replaces all the other symbols, except for the Scatter, to determine a winning combination. The Scatter is instead the game logo and allows access to the Bonus Free Spins function.

In addition to these thematic symbols, we also find gems of different colors: red, orange, green, and blue; precious stones are also present in the previous chapter of the Jim explorer saga and represent a point of continuity between the two games.

Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx: Conclusion

This brand new slot machine (released on November 3rd '19) by Microgaming has a simple and intuitive gameplay mode, while not being ordinary at all: as a result, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx is suitable to be played both by those who are new to the world of slot machines, and by more experienced players who want to try to win even substantial amounts. The variance of this slot machine is, in fact, medium-high: this means that winnings, while not being very frequent, can reach considerable amounts, and indeed, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx offers a maximum win of 6,250 times the bet during free spins, almost twice as much as El Dorado, which instead offered 3,680x.

Overall, because of the simple but rich gameplay, the possibility of substantial winnings, and a very engaging graphics and theme, we feel confident in recommending this game to experienced gamblers!

All you have to do is pack your bags and set off with the explorer Jim!

response.headline: Gameplay
response.content: Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx has a classic five-reel and 35-payline base game that levels up as you play, with multipliers that increase from 2x to 10x with each level. The gameplay is simple and intuitive, making it accessible for both novice and experienced players.

response.headline: Graphics
response.content: The graphics in Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx are essential but well-crafted and clean. The game is set against a desert landscape at sunset with a temple adorned with hieroglyphics as the backdrop, while the symbols are neatly displayed on the screen.

response.headline: Symbols and Features
response.content: Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx has an Ancient Egyptian theme with thematic symbols such as the Book of Ra, an amphora, an inlaid box, and a shield. The wild symbol is the explorer Jim himself, which substitutes for all other symbols except for the scatter. The scatter symbol is the game logo and triggers the bonus free spins feature. response.headline: Winning Potential

The potential for winnings in this game is high, making it a game suited for experienced gamblers.

response.headline: Suitability for Players
response.content: Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx is a game that novice players can easily enjoy as its gameplay is simple and welcoming. However, the game's medium-high variance and potential for significant winnings make it an excellent choice for experienced players looking for a thrilling gaming experience. The engaging graphics and storyline add to the overall appeal of the game, making it a recommended title in the world of online slot games.

Do you remember the beloved explorer Jungle Jim and his adventures in the legendary El Dorado? Well, he's back on the reels of Microgaming, ready for a new adventure set in the shade of the Pyramids. Three years after the release of Jungle Jim and El Dorado, Microgaming software house offers us a new chapter in the saga, improved both in terms of graphics and gameplay: it is in fact a sort of enhanced version of the original game, with a higher potential for winnings and different special features.

The base game is a classic with five reels and 35 paylines, but as you spin the reels, you level up, and each level corresponds to a multiplier that starts at 2x for the first level and reaches 10x with the fifth (twice as much as the maximum multiplier of El Dorado).

The graphics are essential but really well-kept and very clean: the background is a desert landscape at sunset, on which a temple adorned with hieroglyphics stands out and inside which we find the real screen with symbols.

Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters

The symbolism of Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx is obviously thematic, referring to ancient Egyptian culture: among the reels, we find the Book of Ra, an amphora, an inlaid box, and a sort of shield.

The Wild symbol of this slot machine is represented by the explorer Jim himself, who acts as a Joker and replaces all the other symbols, except for the Scatter, to determine a winning combination. The Scatter is instead the game logo and allows access to the Bonus Free Spins function.

In addition to these thematic symbols, we also find gems of different colors: red, orange, green, and blue; precious stones are also present in the previous chapter of the Jim explorer saga and represent a point of continuity between the two games.

Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx: Conclusion

This brand new slot machine (released on November 3rd '19) by Microgaming has a simple and intuitive gameplay mode, while not being ordinary at all: as a result, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx is suitable to be played both by those who are new to the world of slot machines, and by more experienced players who want to try to win even substantial amounts. The variance of this slot machine is, in fact, medium-high: this means that winnings, while not being very frequent, can reach considerable amounts, and indeed, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx offers a maximum win of 6,250 times the bet during free spins, almost twice as much as El Dorado, which instead offered 3,680x.

Overall, because of the simple but rich gameplay, the possibility of substantial winnings, and a very engaging graphics and theme, we feel confident in recommending this game to experienced gamblers!

All you have to do is pack your bags and set off with the explorer Jim!

Review:
 
Gameplay

Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx has a classic five-reel and 35-payline base game that levels up as you play, with multipliers that increase from 2x to 10x with each level. The gameplay is simple and intuitive, making it accessible for both novice and experienced players.

Graphics

The graphics in Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx are essential but well-crafted and clean. The game is set against a desert landscape at sunset with a temple adorned with hieroglyphics as the backdrop, while the symbols are neatly displayed on the screen.

Symbols and Features

Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx has an Ancient Egyptian theme with thematic symbols such as the Book of Ra, an amphora, an inlaid box, and a shield. The wild symbol is the explorer Jim himself, which substitutes for all other symbols except for the scatter. The scatter symbol is the game logo and triggers the bonus free spins feature. Along with themed symbols, there are gems of various colors, providing continuity between the previous title and this enhanced version.

Winning Potential

Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx has a medium-high variance, offering substantial winnings despite not being frequently triggered. The game offers up to 6,250 times the bet amount in free spins, almost twice as much as its predecessor, Jungle Jim and El Dorado, which only offered 3,680x. The potential for winnings in this game is high, making it a game suited for experienced gamblers.

Suitability for Players

Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx is a game that novice players can easily enjoy as its gameplay is simple and welcoming. However, the game's medium-high variance and potential for significant winnings make it an excellent choice for experienced players looking for a thrilling gaming experience. The engaging graphics and storyline add to the overall appeal of the game, making it a recommended title in the world of online slot games.

Review: Jungle Jim and the Lost Sphinx

Do you remember the beloved explorer Jungle Jim and his adventures in the legendary El Dorado? Well, he's back on the reels of Microgaming, ready for a new adventure set in the shade of the Pyramids. Three years after the release of Jungle Jim and El Dorado, Microgaming software house offers us a new chapter in the saga, improved both in terms of graphics and gameplay: it is in fact a sort of enhanced version of the original game, with a higher potential for winnings and different special features.

The base game is a classic with five reels and 35 paylines, but as you spin the reels, you level up, and each level corresponds to a multiplier that starts at 2x for the first level and reaches 10x with the fifth (twice as much as the maximum multiplier of El Dorado).

The graphics are essential but really well-kept and very clean: the background is a desert landscape at sunset, on which a temple adorned with hieroglyphics stands out and inside which we find the real screen with symbols.

Symbols, Wilds, and Scatters

The symbolism of Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx is obviously thematic, referring to ancient Egyptian culture: among the reels, we find the Book of Ra, an amphora, an inlaid box, and a sort of shield.

The Wild symbol of this slot machine is represented by the explorer Jim himself, who acts as a Joker and replaces all the other symbols, except for the Scatter, to determine a winning combination. The Scatter is instead the game logo and allows access to the Bonus Free Spins function.

In addition to these thematic symbols, we also find gems of different colors: red, orange, green, and blue; precious stones are also present in the previous chapter of the Jim explorer saga and represent a point of continuity between the two games.

Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx: Conclusion

This brand new slot machine (released on November 3rd '19) by Microgaming has a simple and intuitive gameplay mode, while not being ordinary at all: as a result, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx is suitable to be played both by those who are new to the world of slot machines, and by more experienced players who want to try to win even substantial amounts. The variance of this slot machine is, in fact, medium-high: this means that winnings, while not being very frequent, can reach considerable amounts, and indeed, Jungle Jim And The Lost Sphinx offers a maximum win of 6,250 times the bet during free spins, almost twice as much as El Dorado, which instead offered 3,680x.

Overall, because of the simple but rich gameplay, the possibility of substantial winnings, and a very engaging graphics and theme, we feel confident in recommending this game to experienced gamblers!

All you have to do is pack your bags and set off with the explorer Jim!
